name: A sheep adventure
description:
Premise

You are a curious sheep. One day you come to a forest. You have never entered here, so you are curious about everything. What is the house in the middle? Can I go in? With such curiosity, you decide to explore the forest and find a way to enter the house.

Control

WASD to move

F to pick up the item

SPACE to create sound

R to shoot the apple (only close to water)

Things To Do

You need to find a way to enter the house.

You can get into conversation with NPC, they will give you useful information.

You can play a shooting game (it is out of the main task) 

Enjoy the game:D This is the first game I develop, if you find some bug or any advice plz connect me
